resources.string: Do you want to select a different location than your current location ?
Hello there ! You are going to witness a great online platform where seller and buyer interact with each other for selling and buying purpose.
As a Buyer you can have a direct interaction with seller by just sitting and typing at your home.And as a Seller you can make your market online to gain more profit!
You can find shops nearby your location and explore the online-offline market around you!
Have a chat with seller about goods and services his/her market offers.
Have fun using this App as it gives services to you to direct interact in the market place without even visiting any market!
